name: 王佩淳
objective:
本課程之目的是以作業研究 (OR) 為理論背景，探討如何運用數學規劃方法求解工程與管理相關的決策問題。課程內容主要是詳細介紹線性規劃中各種方法的概念、模型的建構以及問題求解，透過這些數理邏輯解析的相關訓練強化學生對問題解決的能力。並且，輔以應用案例解析以培養學生理論與應用並重的能力。另外，介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
This course will cover briefly the basics of different area of Operations Research such as: Linear programming, Goal programming, Transportation models and its variants, etc. Also, the course will introduce some tools that help in problem solving and decision making.
schedule:
W1 Introduction to Management Science
W2 Modeling with Linear programming
W3 Linear Programming: Sensitivity Analysis and Interpretation of Solution
W4 Linear Programming Applications in Marketing, Finance, and Operations Management
W5 Linear Programming Applications in Marketing, Finance, and Operations Management
W6 Nonlinear Optimization Models
W7 Distribution and Network Models: assignment problem
W8 Distribution and Network Models: shortest route
W9 Midterm exam
W10 Goal programming
W11 Multi-objective decision-making method
W12 Integer linear programming with application
W13 Advanced Linear Programming Applications: Data Envelopment Analysis and Game theory
W14 Solution algorithm for integer programming
W15 Decision analysis
W16 Decision analysis with probability
W17 Decision analysis with application
W18 Final exam
materials:
1.　　David, R. Anderson, Dennis, J. Sweeney, Thomas A. Williams and Kipp Martin, An Introduction to Management Science: Quantitative Approaches to Decision Making, 14e, 2016, South-Western. 
2.　　Hamdy A. Taha, Operations Research- an introduction, 10e, 2017, PEARSON.
3.　　Optimization Modeling with Lingo, 1999, LINDO System INC.
